Title: Utilizing Official Platform Tools for Product Selection
Content: To effectively select products for your store, leverage the tools provided by official platforms. For instance, on Xiaohongshu's merchant version, you can find a section called 'Community Hot Search Terms' on the homepage. These terms are based on real-time user searches within Xiaohongshu. By creating posts using these hot search terms, you can receive additional traffic rewards. For example, if you see that 'hairpins' are trending, you can explore the high-exposure, high-click, and high-conversion content related to hairpins. Assess whether you can source similar products at competitive prices. Additionally, examine the types of content that are performing well, such as the style, cover, and price range of popular items. This approach helps you align your product offerings with current market demands and gain more visibility.

Title: Analyzing High-Exposure Content for Better Engagement
Content: To create engaging content for your posts, analyze high-exposure content on platforms like Xiaohongshu. For example, if 'hairbands' are trending, look at the top-performing posts related to hairbands. Pay attention to the cover images, titles, styles, and price points of these posts. Identify common elements that contribute to their success, such as appealing visuals, catchy titles, and competitive pricing. By understanding what resonates with the audience, you can create similar content that attracts high engagement. Additionally, consider the format of the content, whether it's a video or an image post, and tailor your content accordingly. This method ensures that your posts are aligned with current trends and have a higher chance of gaining visibility and engagement.

Title: Leveraging Community Hot Search Terms for Increased Visibility
Content: To increase the visibility of your posts, utilize community hot search terms provided by platforms like Xiaohongshu. These terms reflect the most searched keywords by users in real-time. By incorporating these hot search terms into your posts, you can benefit from additional traffic rewards. For instance, if 'lip gloss' is a hot search term, create content around lip gloss products. Ensure that your posts are informative, visually appealing, and relevant to the search term. Additionally, monitor the performance of your posts and adjust your strategy based on the feedback and engagement metrics. This approach helps you stay relevant to current trends and increases the likelihood of your posts being discovered by a larger audience.
